com.genband.kandy.api.services.groups

Interface IKandyGroupService


  • public interface IKandyGroupService
    Interface represents the actions for group and group's participants management

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • registerNotificationListener

        void registerNotificationListener(KandyGroupServiceNotificationListener listener)
        Register to incoming events the client receives from the group service
        Parameters:
        listener - to be registered/added to group service notifications

      • unregisterNotificationListener

        void unregisterNotificationListener(KandyGroupServiceNotificationListener listener)
        Stop listening to group notifications
        Parameters:
        listener - to be unregistered/removed from group service notifications

      • createGroup

        void createGroup(KandyGroupParams groupParams,
                 KandyGroupResponseListener responseListener)
        Create a KandyGroup by the received KandyGroupParams
        Parameters:
        groupParams - KandyGroupParams to use for creating the KandyGroup
        responseListener - will be called upon completion, will contain error in case of failure or KandyGroup in case of success see KandyGroupResponseListener

      • destroyGroup

        void destroyGroup(KandyRecord groupId,
                  KandyResponseListener responseListener)
        Destroy group by group ID
        Parameters:
        groupId - the ID of the group to destroy NOT NULL
        responseListener - KandyResponseListener calls the success callback or fail with error callback

      • updateGroup

        void updateGroup(KandyRecord groupId,
                 KandyGroupParams groupParams,
                 KandyGroupResponseListener responseListener)
        Update a KandyGroup by the received KandyGroupParams
        Parameters:
        groupId - the ID of the group to update
        groupParams - KandyGroupParams to use for updating the KandyGroup
        responseListener - KandyGroupResponseListener will be called upon completion, will contain error in case of failure or KandyGroup in case of success on success will be returned the KandyGroup instance

      • updateGroupName

        void updateGroupName(KandyRecord groupId,
                     String groupName,
                     KandyGroupResponseListener responseListener)
        Update the group name
        Parameters:
        groupId - the ID of the group to update
        groupName - new name to update
        responseListener - KandyGroupResponseListener will be called upon completion, will contain error in case of failure or KandyGroup in case of success on success will be returned the KandyGroup instance

      • updateGroupImage

        void updateGroupImage(KandyRecord groupId,
                      Uri groupImageUri,
                      KandyGroupResponseListener responseListener)
        Update the group image
        Parameters:
        groupId - the ID of the group to update
        groupImageUri - new image to be updated to
        responseListener - KandyGroupResponseListener will be called upon completion, will contain error in case of failure or KandyGroup in case of success

      • addParticipants

        void addParticipants(KandyRecord groupId,
                     List<KandyRecord> participants,
                     KandyGroupResponseListener responseListener)
        Add participants to the group
        Parameters:
        groupId - the ID of the group
        participants - list of KandyRecords of participants to add
        responseListener - KandyGroupResponseListener will be called upon completion, will contain error in case of failure or KandyGroup in case of success

      • removeParticipants

        void removeParticipants(KandyRecord groupId,
                        List<KandyRecord> participants,
                        KandyGroupResponseListener responseListener)
        Remove participants from the group
        Parameters:
        groupId - the ID of the group
        participants - list of KandyRecords of participants to remove
        responseListener - KandyGroupResponseListener will be called upon completion, will contain error in case of failure or KandyGroup in case of success

      • muteGroup

        void muteGroup(KandyRecord groupId,
               KandyGroupResponseListener responseListener)
        Mute group - push notifications from this group will not be received
        Parameters:
        groupId - groupId the ID of the group
        responseListener - KandyGroupResponseListener will be called upon completion, will contain error in case of failure or KandyGroup in case of success on success will be returned KandyGroup instance

      • unmuteGroup

        void unmuteGroup(KandyRecord groupId,
                 KandyGroupResponseListener responseListener)
        Unmute group - push notifications from this group will be received
        Parameters:
        groupId - groupId the ID of the group
        responseListener - KandyGroupResponseListener will be called upon completion, will contain error in case of failure or KandyGroup in case of success on success will be returned KandyGroup instance

      • muteParticipants

        void muteParticipants(KandyRecord groupId,
                      List<KandyRecord> participants,
                      KandyGroupResponseListener responseListener)
        Mute participants - push notifications from this participants will not be received
        Parameters:
        groupId - group where the selected members will be muted
        participants - list of participants to be muted
        responseListener - KandyGroupResponseListener calls the success callback or fail with error callback on success will be returned KandyGroup instance

      • unmuteParticipants

        void unmuteParticipants(KandyRecord groupId,
                        List<KandyRecord> participants,
                        KandyGroupResponseListener responseListener)
        Unmute participants - push notifications from this participants will be received
        Parameters:
        groupId - the ID of the group
        participants - list of the participants to mute
        responseListener - KandyGroupResponseListener will be called upon completion, will contain error in case of failure or KandyGroup in case of success on success will be returned KandyGroup instance

      • getGroupById

        void getGroupById(KandyRecord groupId,
                  KandyGroupResponseListener responseListener)
        Get group details by group id
        Parameters:
        groupId - the ID of the group to get the details of
        responseListener - KandyGroupResponseListener will be called upon completion, will contain error in case of failure or KandyGroup in case of success on success will be returned KandyGroup instance with group details

      • getMyGroups

        void getMyGroups(KandyGroupsResponseListener responseListener)
        Get all my groups
        Parameters:
        responseListener - KandyGroupsResponseListener will be called upon completion, will contain error in case of failure or KandyGroup in case of success

      • leaveGroup

        void leaveGroup(KandyRecord groupId,
                KandyResponseListener responseListener)
        Leave a group
        Parameters:
        groupId - the ID of the group to leave
        responseListener - KandyResponseListener will be called upon completion, will contain error incase of failure

      • downloadGroupImage

        void downloadGroupImage(KandyRecord groupId,
                        KandyResponseProgressListener progressListener)
        Download the group image
        Parameters:
        groupId - id of the group, which image to download
        progressListener - track the downloa dprogress and notify when download succeeded with file's uri on device or failed with error

      • downloadGroupImageThumbnail

        void downloadGroupImageThumbnail(KandyRecord groupId,
                                 KandyThumbnailSize thumbnailSize,
                                 KandyResponseProgressListener progressListener)
        Download the goup's image thumnail
        Parameters:
        groupId - groupId id of the group, which thumbnail to download
        thumbnailSize - size of the thumbnail to be downloaded KandyThumbnailSize
        progressListener - track the downloa dprogress and notify when download succeeded with file's uri on device or failed with error

      • removeGroupImage

        void removeGroupImage(KandyRecord groupId,
                      KandyGroupResponseListener responseListener)
        Remove the Group image(avatar)
        Parameters:
        groupId - group wich image want to remove
        responseListener - KandyResponseListener calls the success callback or fail with error callback

        Gets the settings object to configure service specific configurations
        Returns:
        The settings instance
